Package com.penthera.virtuososdk.service

Package com.penthera.virtuososdk.service

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    VirtuosoForegroundServiceHandler
    The VirtuosoForegroundServiceHandler is a Broadcast Receiver based class which provides the base framework for starting the Download2Go service from the client application.
    VirtuosoServiceStarter
    This class starts the service.
